metadata.synopsis: Dialog with disgusied redcap in BM. This pirate is hammered and convinced the captain is going to spend the night with him (she slept with him once and has sworn to never do so again, but he's in denial).
metadata.how_to_trigger: - CTY_Main_A- Debugbook option "Act3 → LOW - Auntie Ethel's Revenge → Hag was defeated in Act I"- Talk to| Redcap Boatswain | - S_LOW_BlushingMermaid_DisguisedRedcap_03 76784911-9f0d-48f6-8e0d-b609345b2be2 - (-128; 26; -75)

0.speaker: Maggoty Jim
0.text: You giving me eyes? Too bad - this full mast is reserved for the captain.
0.context: NodeContext: clearly hammered, gesturing to himself like he's the most attractive thing on the planet (he's not) (also yes mast is his penis)

1.speaker: Maggoty Jim
1.text: Gotta stay sharp in case the captain calls on me. She likes a bitta 'pearl diving', a spot of 'keel-hauling', the 'ol 'argy bargy', if ya get me.
1.context: NodeContext: clearly hammered, and clearly in no position to be 'called on'
